sentence: Among them are Trump-endorsed candidates running for governor in closely watched states that voted for Joe Biden: Kari Lake of Arizona and former US Senator David Perdue of Georgia.
author: Alex Woodward
title: How members of Congress plan to stop the next Trump from stealing a presidential election

sentence: The Big Lie — the false and totally debunked claim that the 2020 presidential election was stolen from Donald Trump because of widespread voter fraud — continues to be aggressively promoted on the MAGA far-right, from MyPillow CEO Mike Lindell to Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake to Trump himself.
author: Alex Henderson
title: This former Ted Cruz advisor is trying to keep Republicans he once advised from stealing the 2024 election
